page.title: 09HELPING AROUND THE FARMHOUSE
page.content: Our dad works for Mr Dunlop and has to look after all the sheep and the beasts.Seven of us live in Lanes Farm Cottage and we all have to help our mum and dad. Dad gets up at 05.30 to see to the beasts and any lambs that have lost their mother.Alastair,my new baby brother, gets fed first so I get the breakfast ready for dad when he comes back from the byre. We have to tidy up our bedroom and make the beds,hoover the floors,put our toys away in the cupboard and then if it's a school-day make sure our homework books are in our schoolbags. At 08.35 the taxi arrives to take us to the village. When there is no school I like going out on the hills to help my dad-it's much better than helping in the house.
